description: Application shell providing fixed navigation rail with hover expansion, route-based selection, and manager PIN protection for sensitive areas

components.AppShell: Main application shell StatefulWidget providing fixed navigation rail with hover expansion and route-based navigation.

components._AppShellState: State management for navigation rail expansion, hover effects, route selection, and PIN-protected navigation.

components.NavigationItem: Data class defining navigation item structure with icons, labels, and routes for navigation rail items.

rules: Fixed 72px navigation rail positioned on the left side with main content area padding.
Hover-triggered expansion to 220px overlay with text labels and unified highlight coverage.
Navigation items: Dashboard, Calendar, Appointments, Checkout, Tickets, Customers, Employees, Services, Reports, Settings.
Icon-based navigation with selected/unselected icon states for visual feedback.
Route-based selection tracking using GoRouter current configuration URI.
Manager PIN protection for Settings route using PrivilegedOperations authorization system.
Mouse region hover effects with state management for expansion and individual item highlighting.
Overlay label system with proper positioning and background styling during expansion.
Exit button anchored at bottom with confirmation dialog and SystemNavigator.pop integration.
Dark theme navigation (Color(0xFF1A1D2E)) with white icons and text for contrast.
Unified highlight system covering both navigation rail and overlay areas when expanded.
Professional styling with rounded corners, shadows, and proper spacing throughout.
Responsive hover states with different colors for selection vs hover vs normal states.
Authorization failure feedback with SnackBar notifications for denied access attempts.
Logo area with spa icon and 'Luxe Nails' text overlay during expansion.
Material Design InkWell effects with proper touch targets and ripple animations.
Exit confirmation dialog with warning icon, descriptive text, and styled action buttons.
Stateful hover tracking for individual navigation items and exit button separately.
Navigation item data structure with icon pairs and route mapping for flexibility.
Consistent typography using AppTextStyles with proper color theming and font weights.
Transform.translate positioning for precise overlay alignment covering navigation rail area.
Security integration with privileged operations for manager-only access control.
Application-wide navigation shell pattern supporting all major feature routes.
